official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow the continuance of a civil service survivor annuity of a student while the student's education is interrupted because of illness.

summary.text: Entitles any child who is a student during a school year to continue to receive a civil service survivor annuity throughout any period of such year during which the child cannot continue full-time study or training because of illness, if the child satisfies the Office of Personnel Management as to his or her intention to return to school upon recovering.
